data.title: Geospatial Technologies for Local and Regional Development: Proceedings of the 22nd AGILE Conference on Geographic Information Science [1st ed.] 978
data.meta_description: This book includes the full research papers accepted by the scientific programme committee for the 22nd AGILE Conference...
data.text:
Table of contents :

Front Matter ....Pages i-xiii

Front Matter ....Pages 1-1

Place Questions and Human-Generated Answers: A Data Analysis Approach (Ehsan Hamzei, Haonan Li, Maria Vasardani, Timothy Baldwin, Stephan Winter, Martin Tomko)....Pages 3-19

Relaxing Unanswerable Geographic Questions Using A Spatially Explicit Knowledge Graph Embedding Model (Gengchen Mai, Bo Yan, Krzysztof Janowicz, Rui Zhu)....Pages 21-39

Evaluating the Effectiveness of Embeddings in Representing the Structure of Geospatial Ontologies (Federico Dassereto, Laura Di Rocco, Giovanna Guerrini, Michela Bertolotto)....Pages 41-57

Web-Based Visualization of Big Geospatial Vector Data (Florian Zouhar, Ivo Senner)....Pages 59-74

Front Matter ....Pages 75-75

A Clustering-Based Framework for Understanding Individuals’ Travel Mode Choice Behavior (Pengxiang Zhao, Dominik Bucher, Henry Martin, Martin Raubal)....Pages 77-94

Classification of Urban and Rural Routes Based on Motorcycle Riding Behaviour (Gerhard Navratil, Ioannis Giannopoulos, Gilbert Kotzbek)....Pages 95-108

Route Choice Decisions of E-bike Users: Analysis of GPS Tracking Data in the Netherlands (Gamze Dane, Tao Feng, Floor Luub, Theo Arentze)....Pages 109-124

Route Optimisation for Winter Maintenance (Nikmal Raghestani, Carsten Keßler)....Pages 125-142

Front Matter ....Pages 143-143

Tracing Tourism Geographies with Google Trends: A Dutch Case Study (Andrea Ballatore, Simon Scheider, Bas Spierings)....Pages 145-163

Estimating the Spatial Distribution of Vacant Houses Using Public Municipal Data (Yuki Akiyama, Akihiro Ueda, Kenta Ouchi, Natsuki Ito, Yoshiya Ono, Hideo Takaoka et al.)....Pages 165-183

Enhancing the Use of Population Statistics Derived from Mobile Phone Users by Considering Building-Use Dependent Purpose of Stay (Toshihiro Osaragi, Ryo Kudo)....Pages 185-203

Potential of Crowdsourced Traces for Detecting Updates in Authoritative Geographic Data (Stefan S. Ivanovic, Ana-Maria Olteanu-Raimond, Sébastien Mustière, Thomas Devogele)....Pages 205-221

A Scalable Analytical Framework for Spatio-Temporal Analysis of Neighborhood Change: A Sequence Analysis Approach (Nikos Patias, Francisco Rowe, Stefano Cavazzi)....Pages 223-241

Improving Business-as-Usual Scenarios in Land Change Modelling by Extending the Calibration Period and Integrating Demographic Data (Romain Mejean, Martin Paegelow, Mehdi Saqalli, Doryan Kaced)....Pages 243-260

Front Matter ....Pages 261-261

Market Area Delineation for Airports to Predict the Spread of Infectious Disease (Carmen Huber, Claus Rinner)....Pages 263-289

Reflective Practice: Lessons Learnt by Using Board Games as a Design Tool for Location-Based Games (Catherine Jones, Konstantinos Papangelis)....Pages 291-307

Agent-Based Simulation for Indoor Manufacturing Environments—Evaluating the Effects of Spatialization (Stefan Kern, Johannes Scholz)....Pages 309-324

Front Matter ....Pages 325-325

Towards a Usability Scale for Participatory GIS (Andrea Ballatore, Will McClintock, Grace Goldberg, Werner Kuhn)....Pages 327-348

Future Occupational Profiles in Earth Observation and Geoinformation—Scenarios Resulting from Changing Workflows (Barbara Hofer, Stefan Lang, Nicole Ferber)....Pages 349-366
